channel.title: mailcow: dockerized - Blog
channel.description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo' – 🐮 + 🐋 = 💕 | Official Blog Page

item.title: 🌌🐮 Mooay 2022 Update - The Tag Update | Revision B - Changelog
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description: 2022-05b It´s us again! Today we have a small API Fix Update which focus mainly on the UI. As some of you reported the API Calls for Domains/Mailboxes don´t work anymore if there is no Tag set. This is now fixed. Additionaly, we´ve added a small tweak for the UI. Did you know that there was a little plus symbol at the left of a Domain/Mailbox? No? Don´t worry it was a little hard to see… until now :)
